message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. I think it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900,000. This is a great deal, considering the product's true value is much higher. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $900,000 is a good starting point, but I'm looking to get a better deal.  I'm willing to pay $800,000 for the product.  Let me know what you think.

Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I'm still willing to negotiate. Considering the product's value to you is $1,200,000, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell it to you for $850,000. This is a fair price, considering the value it will bring to your business. What do you think?
